metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace
[concat('Region to deploy solution resources -- separate from location selection',parameters('location'))]
Workspace name for Log Analytics where Microsoft Sentinel is setup
Name of the playbook, used as name for the resources. Use only letters and dashes.
Name of the storage account, which will be created by the playbook.

Name of the Azure Keyvault, which will be created by the playbook. A vault's name must be between 3-24 alphanumeric characters. The name must begin with a letter, end with a letter or digit, and not contain consecutive hyphens.
Name of the Azure Function App, which will be created by the playbook.
Update to a valid Zscaler admin url.
Your Zscaler key.
Your Zscaler username.
Your Zscaler password.

files.index.js: module.exports = function (context, data) {  var input = data;    var timestamp = Date.now().toString();    var high = timestamp.substring(timestamp.length - 6);    var low = (parseInt(high) >> 1).toString();    var apiKey = '';    while (low.length < 6) {    low = '0' + low;    }    for (var i = 0; i < high.length; i++) {    apiKey += input.body.key.charAt(parseInt(high.charAt(i)));    }    for (var j = 0; j < low.length; j++) {    apiKey += input.body.key.charAt(parseInt(low.charAt(j)) + 2);    }    context.res = {    body: {      apiKey: apiKey,      timestamp: timestamp    }  };  context.done();};

metadata.title: Zscaler API authentication
metadata.description: This playbook generates access token in Zscaler API. Call this playbook as a step in functional Zscaler playbooks. The output is a JSessionID which can be used to do other API actions
prerequisites: Playbook templates leverage the Zscaler API. To use the Zscaler capabilities, you need a Zscaler API key. Refer this link: [API Developers Guide: Getting Started](https://help.zscaler.com/zia/api-getting-started)

metadata.description: Name of the Logic App/Playbook
Name of the Zscaler Authentication Playbook
Update to a valid Zscaler admin url.
Zscaler block category

metadata.title: Block URL - Zscaler
metadata.description: This playbook allows blocks URLs in Zscaler by adding them to categories
prerequisites: 1. This playbook leverages a nested playbook: Zscaler authentication. Deploy this playbook before deploying this template in the same resource group.
2. Create a block category in Zscaler, which this playbook will add IPs to.

metadata.description: Name of the Logic App/Playbook
Name of the Zscaler Authentication Playbook
Update to a valid Zscaler admin url.

body.message:
@{outputs('Compose')}
FileHash report from Zscaler playbook:

Summary:
Status: @{body('Parse_Result')?['Summary']?['Summary']?['Status']}
Category: @{body('Parse_Result')?['Summary']?['Summary']?['Category']}
FileType: @{body('Parse_Result')?['Summary']?['Summary']?['FileType']}

Classification:
Type: @{body('Parse_Result')?['Summary']?['Classification']?['Type']}
Category: @{body('Parse_Result')?['Summary']?['Classification']?['Category']}
Score: @{body('Parse_Result')?['Summary']?['Classification']?['Score']}
Detected Malware: @{body('Parse_Result')?['Summary']?['Classification']?['DetectedMalware']}

File properties:
File type: @{body('Parse_Result')?['Summary']?['FileProperties']?['FileType']}
File size: @{body('Parse_Result')?['Summary']?['FileProperties']?['FileSize']}
MD5: @{body('Parse_Result')?['Summary']?['FileProperties']?['MD5']}
SHA1: @{body('Parse_Result')?['Summary']?['FileProperties']?['SHA1']}
Sha256: @{body('Parse_Result')?['Summary']?['FileProperties']?['Sha256']}
Issuer: @{body('Parse_Result')?['Summary']?['FileProperties']?['Issuer']}
Digital certificate: @{body('Parse_Result')?['Summary']?['FileProperties']?['DigitalCerificate']}
SSDeep: @{body('Parse_Result')?['Summary']?['FileProperties']?['SSDeep']}
RootCA: @{body('Parse_Result')?['Summary']?['FileProperties']?['RootCA']}

metadata.title: FileHash Enrichment - Zscaler
metadata.description: This playbook post a Zscaler Sandbox report for each FileHash found in the incident.
prerequisites: 1. This playbook leverages a nested playbook: Zscaler authentication. Deploy this playbook before deploying this template in the same resource group.
2. Create a block category in Zscaler, which this playbook will add IPs to.
